channel.title: tool on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in tool on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Approaches To Manage Concurrent Workloads Like Worker Pools And Pipelines
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction Go provides us great and convenient ways to write concurrent programs with high performance to execute tasks concurrently (perhaps in parallel if the program is run on a machine with multiple physical cores, GOMAXPROCS are automatically set to the number of physical cores of the machine that the program is running on)

item.title: Accelerate Project Initiation With Advanced Nextjs Boilerplate React Toolkit
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Accelerate Project Initiation with Advanced NextJS-Boilerplate & React-Toolkit In today’s fast-paced world of software development, project initiation can often be a challenging and time-consuming process, with teams facing issues such as inconsistent code quality, slow setup times, and suboptimal workflows.

item.title: Istio
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Istio is an implementation of the Service mesh architecture, which is a network of microservices that interactive with each other to form an application.
